title: Our Five Senses
description: Our Five Senses informs students about how our brain uses the senses to identify objects. This text provides students with the opportunity to summarize and classify information. Detailed, supportive photographs and repetitive phrases support early readers.
reviewWords: bitter, brain, senses, smells, sour, taste buds
awareness: Segment Onset and Rime                : Segment onset and rime
wordWork: Question Words                : Recognize and use question words
